margaritas.name: Classic
margaritas.ingredients: Tequila, sour mix, lime, salt rim
margaritas.comment: A hard to beat anytime of the year drink.

margaritas.name: Manberry
margaritas.ingredients: Strawberry mango puree, frozen margarita mix, lime, strawberry, sugar rim
margaritas.comment: A sweet twist on a classic cocktail.

margaritas.name: Coronarita
margaritas.ingredients: Tequila, sour mix, lime, orange, salt rim, Corona
margaritas.comment: Best of both worlds. A beer and a margarita.

margaritas.name: Jalepeño
margaritas.ingredients: Tequila, sour mix, jalepeño simple syrup, lime, fresh jalepeño, chili lime salt rim
margaritas.comment: A refreshing cocktail with a little kick to it.

margaritas.name: Coconut
margaritas.ingredients: Tequila, Malibu, sour mix, lime, toasted coconut sugar rim
margaritas.comment: Tastes like good summer vibes in a glass.
